attributes.action: A general election - next steps of EU relationship to be decided democratically
attributes.additional_details:
- safety and security of the country
- stability to markets
- halt the power vacuum
- international reputation
attributes.background: This country is divided. The only way forward is to continue democratically. If there is a proposal for a plan  for a relationship with the EU , then it needs to be decided on democratically by the populace, through our voting system. It must NOT be done by one political party behind closed doors.
